1COR 8.12 swa-þ-þan frawaurkjandans wiþra broþruns, slahandans ize gahugd siuka, du Xristau frawaurkeiþ.
1COR 8.13 duþþe jabai mats gamarzeiþ broþar, ni matja mimz aiw, ei ni gamarzjau broþar meinana.
niu Iesu Xristau fraujan unsarana saƕ?
niu waurstw meinata jus sijuþ in fraujin?
1COR 9.2 jabai anþaraim ni im apaustaulus, aiþþau izwis im;
unte sigljo meinaizos apaustauleins jus sijuþ.
1COR 9.3 meina andahafts wiþra þans mik ussokjandans þatist.
1COR 9.4 ibai ni habam waldufni matjan jah drigkan?
1COR 9.5 ibai ni habam waldufni swistar qinon bitiuhan, swaswe þai anþarai apaustauleis jah broþrjus fraujins jah Kefas?
1COR 9.6 þau ainzu ik jah Barnabas ni habos waldufni du ni waurkjan?
1COR 9.7 ƕas drauhtinoþ swesaim annom ƕan?
ƕas satjiþ weinatriwa jah akran þize ni matjai?
ƕas haldiþ aweþi jah miluks þis aweþjis ni matjai?
1COR 9.8 ibai bi mannam þata qiþa, aiþþau niu jah witoþ þata qiþiþ?
1COR 9.9 in witoda auk Mosezis gameliþ ist:
1COR 9.20 jah warþ Iudaium swe Judaius, ei Judaiuns gageigaidedjau;
þaim uf witoda swe uf witoda, ni wisands silba uf witoda, ak uf anstai, ei þans uf witoda gageigaidedjau;
1COR 9.21 þaim witodalausam swe witodalaus, ni wisands witodis laus gudis, ak inwitoþs Xristaus, ei gageigaidedjau witodalausans.
1COR 9.22 was þaim unmahteigam swe unmahteigs, ei unmahteigans gageigaidedjau;
allaim was all, ei ƕaiwa sumans ganasjau.
1COR 9.23 þat-uþ-þan tauja in aiwaggeljis, ei gadaila is wairþau.
1COR 9.24 niu wituþ þatei þai in spaurd rinnandans allai rinnand, iþ ains nimiþ sigislaun?
1COR 9.25 iþ ƕazuh saei haifstjan sniwiþ, allis sik gaþarbaiþ; aþþan eis, ei riurjana waip nimaina, iþ weis unriurjana.
1COR 9.26 aþþan ik nu swa rinna, ni swe du unwissamma;
swa jiuka, ni swe luftu bliggwands;
1COR 9.27 ak leik mein wlizja jah anaþiwa, ibai anþaraim merjands silba uskusans wairþau.

1COR 10.1 Ni wiljau izwis unwitans, broþrjus, þatei attans unsarai allai uf milhmin wesun, jah allai marein þairhiddjedun, 1COR 10.2 jah allai in Mose daupidai wesun, in milhmin jah in marein, 1COR 10.3 jah allai þana saman mat ahmeinan matidedun, 1COR 10.4 jah allai þata samo dragk ahmeino drugkun...
1COR 10.16 stikls þiuþiqissais þanei gaweiham, niu gamainduþs bloþis fraujins ist?
hlaifs þanei brikam, niu gamainduþs leikis fraujins ist?
1COR 10.17 unte ains hlaifs, ain leik þai managans sium, þaiei auk allai ainis hlaibis jah ainis stiklis brukjam.
niu þai matjandans hunsla gamainjandans hunslastada sind?
þatei þo galiugaguda ƕa sijaina aiþþau þatei galiugam saljada ƕa sijai?
1COR 10.20 ak, þatei saljand þiudos, skohslam saljand, janni guda.
Ni wiljau auk izwis skohslam gadailans wairþan.
1COR 10.21 ni maguþ stikl fraujins drigkan jah stikl skohsle;
ni maguþ biudis fraujins fairaihan jabbiudis skohsle.
1COR 10.23 all binah, akei ni all daug;
all mis binauht ist, akei ni all timreiþ.
1COR 10.24 ni ainshun sein sokjai, ak anþaris ƕarjizuh.
1COR 10.25 all þatei at skiljam frabugjaidau matjaiþ, ni waiht andhruskandans in miþwisseins.
1COR 10.26 fraujins ist auk airþa jah fullo izos.
